item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特斯拉要求供应商避免为美国汽车提供中国制造的零部件
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，特斯拉现在要求其供应商在美国生产汽车时不使用中国制造的零部件。【原文：Tesla is now requiring its suppliers to exclude China-made components in the manufacturing of its cars in the U.S., the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美国陪审团称苹果必须在智能手表专利案中向 Masimo 支付 6.34 亿美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的一个联邦陪审团周五表示，苹果公司因侵犯血氧读取技术专利而欠医疗监控技术公司 Masimo 6.34 亿美元。【原文：A federal jury in California said on Friday that Apple owes medical-monitoring technology company Masimo $634 million for infringing a patent covering blood-oxygen reading technology.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：苹果公司加强首席执行官蒂姆-库克的继任计划
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，苹果公司正在加紧制定接班人计划，为蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）最快于明年卸任首席执行官一职做准备。【原文：Apple is stepping up its succession planning efforts as it prepares for Tim Cook to step down as chief executive as soon as next year, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，纽约联储就关键贷款机制与银行会面
item.description: 据《金融时报》周五报道，纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）本周与华尔街银行会面，讨论一项关键的短期借贷机制，因为有迹象表明市场流动性趋紧。【原文：New York Federal Reserve President John Williams met with Wall Street banks this week to discuss a key short-term lending facility, the Financial Times reported on Friday, amid signs of tighter market liquidity.】

item.title: 部分华尔街对冲基金第三季度削减巨型股仓位
item.description: 华尔街最大的对冲基金在第三季度减少了对包括英伟达（Nvidia）、亚马逊（Amazon）、Alphabet 和 Meta 在内的一些 "七巨头 "股票的投资，同时在应用软件、电子商务和支付等行业下了新的赌注。【原文：Wall Street's largest hedge funds reduced exposure to some Magnificent Seven stocks, including Nvidia, Amazon, Alphabet and Meta, in the third quarter, while placing new bets in sectors such as application software, e-commerce and payments, according to the latest quarterly disclosures from the funds.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华平、Permira 正在洽谈收购 Clearwater Analytics 公司
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，全球私募股权投资公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus）和 Permira 正在洽谈收购投资和会计软件制造商 Clearwater Analytics。【原文：Global private equity firms Warburg Pincus and Permira are in talks to buy investment and accounting software maker Clearwater Analytics , a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 迪斯尼旗下的 ESPN、ABC 在经历数周的中断后将重返 YouTube TV
item.description: 谷歌的 YouTube 和迪斯尼公司周五表示，他们已经达成协议，将迪斯尼旗下的网络（包括 ESPN 和 ABC）恢复到 YouTube TV 上，从而结束了数百万用户无法收看重要节目和重大体育赛事直播的僵局。【原文：Google's YouTube and Walt Disney said on Friday they had reached an agreement to restore Disney-owned networks, including ESPN and ABC, to YouTube TV, ending a standoff that had cut off millions of subscribers from key programming and major live sports events.】

item.title: 美国对冲基金第三季度减持 "华丽七剑 "股票
item.description: 周五的监管文件显示，华尔街最大的对冲基金在第三季度减持了包括英伟达（Nvidia）、亚马逊（Amazon）、Alphabet 和 Meta 在内的 "华丽七雄 "股票，同时在应用软件、电子商务和支付公司中建立了新的仓位。【原文：Wall Street's largest hedge funds reduced exposure to "Magnificent Seven" stocks including Nvidia , Amazon , Alphabet and Meta in the third quarter, while taking new positions in application software, e-commerce and payments companies, according to regulatory filings on Friday.】

item.title: 仲裁失利后，壳牌被勒令支付 Venture Global 的法律费用
item.description: Venture Global 公司周五表示，继壳牌公司最近在液化天然气（LNG）供应索赔仲裁中败诉后，国际商会专家组已作出裁决，责令壳牌公司支付其法律费用。【原文：Venture Global said on Friday that following Shell’s recent loss in arbitration over liquefied natural gas (LNG) supply claims, an International Chamber of Commerce panel has issued an award ordering Shell to pay its legal fees.】

item.title: 派拉蒙天舞公司将向投资集团出售智利电视台
item.description: 派拉蒙天舞公司（Paramount Skydance）周五表示，已同意将其在智利免费电视频道 Chilevision 控制实体中的股份出售给 Vytal 集团。【原文：Paramount Skydance on Friday said it has agreed to sell its shares in the entities that control Chilean free-to-air TV channel Chilevision to Vytal Group.】

item.title: 激进派 Starboard 在推动变革后出售辉瑞股份
item.description: 根据周五提交的一份监管文件，激进投资者Starboard Value已经清算了其在辉瑞公司的持仓，从而结束了其推动旨在提振这家制药商股价的改革。【原文：Activist investor Starboard Value has liquidated its position in Pfizer , according to a regulatory filing on Friday, ending its push for changes aimed at boosting the drugmaker's share price.】

item.title: 美国高官称，危地马拉的 Castillo Hermanos 公司以 14 亿美元收购美国 SunnyD 生产商
item.description: 美国副国务卿克里斯托弗-兰道周五在社交媒体上宣布，危地马拉公司 Castillo Hermanos 以 14 亿美元的价格收购了美国 Harvest Hill 公司，后者是 SunnyD 等饮料的制造商。【原文：Guatemalan firm Castillo Hermanos acquired U.S.-based Harvest Hill, maker of beverages such as SunnyD, for $1.4 billion, the U.S. Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau announced on Friday on social media.】

item.title: 谷歌广告技术反垄断审判结案陈词推迟
item.description: 法院表示，Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司为避免其广告技术业务在美国法院被分拆而提出的最后抗辩已被推迟到 11 月 21 日。【原文：A final plea by Alphabet's Google to avoid a breakup of its advertising technology business in a U.S. court has been moved to November 21, the court said.】

item.title: 美国为出售卢克石油公司海外资产谈判铺平道路
item.description: 在保加利亚采取行动查封卢克石油公司布尔加斯炼油厂之后，特朗普政府周五批准潜在买家与俄罗斯卢克石油公司就购买其海外资产进行商谈，并允许与卢克石油公司布尔加斯炼油厂进行业务往来。【原文：The Trump administration on Friday gave clearance to potential buyers to talk to Russia's Lukoil about buying its foreign assets and allowed business dealings with Lukoil's Burgas refinery after Bulgaria moved to seize the plant.】

item.title: 特朗普下调牛肉、咖啡和其他食品关税，通胀担忧加剧
item.description: 白宫表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统周五签署了一项行政命令，免除今年早些时候对几乎所有国家征收的全面关税，其中包括牛肉、西红柿、咖啡和香蕉等多种食品进口。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday signed an executive order to exempt a wide range of food imports, including beef, tomatoes, coffee and bananas, from sweeping tariffs imposed earlier this year on nearly every country, the White House said.】

item.title: 伯克希尔买入谷歌母公司 Alphabet 股票，卖出更多苹果股票
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周五透露，将以 43 亿美元的价格持有谷歌母公司 Alphabet 的股份，并表示进一步减持了苹果公司的股份，在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）结束其长达 60 年的首席执行官任期之前，最后一次详细介绍了其股票投资组合。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway on Friday revealed a $4.3 billion stake in Google parent Alphabet and said it further reduced its stake in Apple , detailing its equity portfolio for the last time before Warren Buffett ends his 60-year run as chief executive.】

item.title: 沃尔玛内部人士约翰-福纳（John Furner）将在人工智能押注和经济动荡中引领下一篇章
item.description: 当约翰-福纳于 2 月 1 日就任沃尔玛最高职位时，他的协作领导风格和对公司的深入了解将面临考验，因为他将带领公司度过艰难的经济时期。【原文：When John Furner takes the top job at Walmart on Feb. 1, his collaborative leadership style and deep company knowledge will be tested as he steers the firm through tough economic times.】

item.title: 谷歌到 2027 年将在得克萨斯州投资 400 亿美元
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周五表示，将投资 400 亿美元在德克萨斯州新建三个数据中心，直至 2027 年。【原文：Alphabet's Google said on Friday it would invest $40 billion in three new data centers in Texas through 2027, as the company accelerates efforts to expand capacity for supporting its artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 巴西普鲁莫公司出售与英美资源集团的合资企业股份
item.description: 巴西物流公司 Prumo 周五表示，同意出售其在 Ferroport 50%的股份，该公司是与矿商英美资源集团（Anglo American）的合资企业，在里约热内卢的 Acu 港运营一个铁矿石码头。【原文：Brazilian logistics firm Prumo said on Friday it agreed to sell its 50% stake in Ferroport, a joint venture with miner Anglo American that operates an iron ore terminal at Rio de Janeiro's Acu Port.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，激进投资者 Irenic 正在增持约翰老爹的股份
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士周五告诉路透社，激进投资者 Irenic Capital Management 在第三季度增持了 Papa John's 的股份，这为人们对这家披萨连锁店未来的猜测增添了新的色彩。【原文：Activist investor Irenic Capital Management built a stake in Papa John's during the third quarter, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday, adding a fresh dimension to mounting speculation about the pizza chain's future.】

item.title: 美联储罗根：难以支持 12 月降息
item.description: 达拉斯联储主席洛里-洛根周五再次表示，她将反对美联储在12月降息，此前她也反对美联储在10月降息，因为她担心通胀率过高，呈上升趋势，而且需要太长时间才能达到美联储2%的目标。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve President Lorie Logan on Friday again signaled she would oppose an interest-rate cut in December, after also opposing the Fed's rate cut in October, because of her concern that inflation is too high, trending upward, and taking too long to get to the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: 老虎环球将 Meta 股份削减 63
item.description: 周五公布的一份文件显示，由大通-科尔曼（Chase Coleman）创立并领导的对冲基金老虎环球管理公司（Tiger Global Management）在第三季度削减了其在 Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 的持股。【原文：Tiger Global Management, the hedge fund founded and led by Chase Coleman, slashed its stake in Facebook parent Meta Platforms during the third quarter, according to a filing released on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，巴里克矿业公司考虑分拆为两个实体
item.description: 四位熟悉加拿大巴里克矿业公司想法的消息人士告诉路透社，该公司董事会提出了将公司拆分为两个独立实体的可能性，一个专注于北美，另一个专注于非洲和亚洲。【原文：The board of Canada's Barrick Mining has raised the possibility of splitting the company into two separate entities, one focused on North America and the other on Africa and Asia, four sources familiar with the company's thinking told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称激进投资者 Jana Partners 第三季度增持阿尔卡米技术公司股份
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，激进投资者 Jana Partners 在第三季度增持了美国银行技术公司 Alkami Technology 的股份。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners built a new stake in U.S. banking technology company Alkami Technology during the third quarter, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 网站显示美国将允许涉及卢克石油公司和里海管道财团的交易
item.description: 美国财政部网站上的公告显示，美国周五颁发了一般许可证，授权涉及保加利亚卢克石油公司（Lukoil）某些实体的交易以及与里海管道财团有关的石油服务和其他交易。【原文：The United States issued general licenses on Friday authorizing transactions involving certain Lukoil entities in Bulgaria and petroleum services and other transactions related to the Caspian Pipeline Consortium, a posting on the Treasury Department's website showed.】

item.title: 共和党州检察官对联合太平洋公司收购诺福克南方公司的交易表示担忧
item.description: 九个共和党州的总检察长周五对联合太平洋公司（UNP.N）计划以 850 亿美元收购较小的竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）以创建美国第一家海岸到海岸货运铁路运营商的交易提出了竞争方面的担忧。【原文：A group of nine Republican state attorneys general on Friday raised competition concerns about Union Pacific's UNP.N plan to buy smaller rival Norfolk Southern in an $85 billion deal to create the first U.S. coast-to-coast freight rail operator.】

item.title: 美国人口普查局将于下周发布 8 月份贸易和建筑报告
item.description: 美国商务部人口普查局周五表示，将于下周公布8月份的建筑支出、工厂订单和国际贸易数据。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department's Census Bureau said on Friday it would next week publish August's construction spending, factory orders and international trade, data that were delayed because of the recently ended shutdown of the federal government.】

item.title: 美乌关键矿产基金聘请 A&M 公司顾问确定项目
item.description: 负责监督美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与乌克兰达成的重要矿产交易的美国基金周五表示，它已指定咨询公司 Alvarez & Marsal 帮助其识别和评估潜在机会。【原文：The U.S. fund overseeing U.S. President Donald Trump's critical minerals deal with Ukraine said on Friday it had appointed advisory firm Alvarez & Marsal to help it identify and size up potential opportunities.】

item.title: 人工智能投资加剧投资者担忧，甲骨文债券遭抛售
item.description: 据分析师和投资者称，甲骨文公司的债券最近几天受到冲击，因为有报道称这家云计算和人工智能服务提供商计划在其沉重的债务负担上再增加 380 亿美元，以资助其人工智能基础设施。【原文：Oracle Corp bonds have taken a hit in recent days following a report that the cloud and artificial intelligence service provider plans to add another $38 billion to its heavy debt load to fund its AI infrastructure, according to analysts and investors.】

item.title: 美国贸易法庭将审议新的 Apple Watch 进口禁令
item.description: 美国国际贸易委员会（U.S. International Trade Commission）周五决定启动一项新的程序，以确定是否应禁止进口苹果公司更新版 Apple 手表，这是该委员会与医疗监测技术公司 Masimo 专利纠纷的一部分。【原文：The U.S. International Trade Commission decided on Friday to hold a new proceeding to determine whether imports of Apple's updated Apple Watches should be banned as part of a patent dispute with medical monitoring technology company Masimo .】
